document_data.mainbody:
Lharave () was a ranger and swanmay in the Dalelands area in 1357 DR.
Lharave lived in the wilds of Daggerdales western reaches, and the eastern slopes of the Thunder Peaks to the south of Daggerdale. She preferred to avoid associating herself with humans but helped people in danger.
Lharave was an ally of the Harpers.
